ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of SALVATORE (SAM) BARONE, Vice-Chairperson and member of the Canadian Transportation Agency, for the period he is acting as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Agency, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Agency.
